title: Kitakubu Katsudou Kiroku
alternative_title: Chronicles of the Going Home Club, 帰宅部活動記録
description: When a friend asks Natsuki what high school club she’s going to join, she cheerfully responds “the go-home club” (meaning, she’s not going to join any of them). However, she soon realizes that this club actually exists at her high school, and she’s just expressed interest in joining it! Before she
